entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Marble Mountain
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:31 AM NST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries or snow squalls. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries becoming mixed with snow squalls this afternoon. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. Forecast issued 07:47 AM NST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries or snow squalls. Low minus 15 except minus 11 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Flurries. Flurries or snow squalls this evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 15 except minus 11 along parts of the coast. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 07:47 AM NST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries. High minus 5.
